titleNullable: Photographs of 28 different domino tile classes
subtitleNullable: 2.800 photos of domino tiles (100x100px) for image classification.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I used to play a lot of dominoes and thought about creating an app that would calculate the points of domino tiles in real time using your smart phone camera. I hired a Virtual Assistant to take photographs of a subset of domino tiles to make a proof of concept in terms of image detection, and as my app project never came true I thought I'd share it here.


### Content

The images consist of 28 different domino tiles (i.e. not a full set) of domino tiles in a 1-9 points per tile game. Each photo is just of one domino tile per image, with different rotation and zoom. The images are in jpg-format.


### Acknowledgements

These photographs were mainly taken by my Virtual Assistant Mary Anne Remulla.


### Inspiration

Could this be the start of an app that would count the sum of all points in domino tiles on a table, calculate your best next move given the table layout etc.?
